rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel "setup.schedule", update
expiration in $L.schedule=tod()
to
expiration in $L.schedule=tod()+'00:00:10'
Update for support catalog, now support catalog will add fulfillment schedule with name "Support Catalog Fullfillment for".
Change for 7.11 created too many errors when ported to Amanda. It is not known what caused this error prone behavior.
$L.new instead of $L.file for the handle
correction is to add a nullsub function for NULL values as in:
Match a change that fixed the operation of this trigger in 7.11. Addition of an condition to execute the next RAD routine in the is.approve.change decision panel on both decision lines.
Changed to create a schedule record of class 'linker' that calls svcCat.call.fulfillment instead of creating the fulfillment records directly.

devtx I2202: Since bundles do not create an screlation record, there is no way to set the completed flag to true for a svcCartItem record that its bundle flag is true. For SLA to process correctly, it needs to check on the combination this flag and teh completed flag.
Put the removed line back into set.bundle panel:
completed in $L.bundle=true
Devtx I2020:The submitted flag was being set only for bundles. Modified panels to also set the submitted flag to true for items. Removed panel reselect.item and changed the following panels:
check.update.item:
normal exit changed from process.cart.item to set.item.submitted
update.item:
normal exit changed from get.next.item to process.cart.item
get.next.item:
normal exit changed from process.cart.item to set.item.submitted
Pulled the reselect.item panel out of the logic flow to stop it from looping infinitely.
devtx I2202: removed setting the completed flag to ture for the item. Removed the first line in panel set.bundle:
completed in $L.bundle=true
Set the submitted flag in the cart item correctly.

Added $L.svc.cart.item parameter in call.connector panel to be passed to svcCat.init.interface since the cart item parameter was added to the svcCat.init.interface Rad application. This is mainly due to providing the cart item info for external web service.
new trigger app
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added call to billing after call to generate explines.
Changed panel set in trigger.incidents.after.update to set operator in $L.cmlabor=operator() instead of operator in $L.cmlabor=opened.by in $L.file
Switched error message to include last panel executed.
Added message to the error exit so that we will have some indication that there was a problem.
Only cut expense lines if module is enabled

descript.descript: update panel "setup.schedule", update
expiration in $L.schedule=tod()
to
expiration in $L.schedule=tod()+'00:00:10'
Update for support catalog, now support catalog will add fulfillment schedule with name "Support Catalog Fullfillment for".
Change for 7.11 created too many errors when ported to Amanda. It is not known what caused this error prone behavior.
$L.new instead of $L.file for the handle
correction is to add a nullsub function for NULL values as in:
Match a change that fixed the operation of this trigger in 7.11. Addition of an condition to execute the next RAD routine in the is.approve.change decision panel on both decision lines.
Changed to create a schedule record of class 'linker' that calls svcCat.call.fulfillment instead of creating the fulfillment records directly.

devtx I2202: Since bundles do not create an screlation record, there is no way to set the completed flag to true for a svcCartItem record that its bundle flag is true. For SLA to process correctly, it needs to check on the combination this flag and teh completed flag.
Put the removed line back into set.bundle panel:
completed in $L.bundle=true
Devtx I2020:The submitted flag was being set only for bundles. Modified panels to also set the submitted flag to true for items. Removed panel reselect.item and changed the following panels:
check.update.item:
normal exit changed from process.cart.item to set.item.submitted
update.item:
normal exit changed from get.next.item to process.cart.item
get.next.item:
normal exit changed from process.cart.item to set.item.submitted
Pulled the reselect.item panel out of the logic flow to stop it from looping infinitely.
devtx I2202: removed setting the completed flag to ture for the item. Removed the first line in panel set.bundle:
completed in $L.bundle=true
Set the submitted flag in the cart item correctly.

Added $L.svc.cart.item parameter in call.connector panel to be passed to svcCat.init.interface since the cart item parameter was added to the svcCat.init.interface Rad application. This is mainly due to providing the cart item info for external web service.
new trigger app
Made changes for TeleCenter/Connect.It. intergration ST22997
Added call to billing after call to generate explines.
Changed panel set in trigger.incidents.after.update to set operator in $L.cmlabor=operator() instead of operator in $L.cmlabor=opened.by in $L.file
Switched error message to include last panel executed.
Added message to the error exit so that we will have some indication that there was a problem.
Only cut expense lines if module is enabled
If the call is not closed then set first.call=false
